auth.emailRequired: Don Allah shigar da adireshin imel ɗinku
auth.emailInvalid: Don Allah shigar da adireshin imel mai inganci
auth.passwordRequired: Kalmar sirri dole ta zama aƙalla haruffa 8
auth.firstNamePlaceholder: Shigar da sunan ku na farko
auth.firstNameRequired: Don Allah shigar da sunan ku na farko
auth.lastNamePlaceholder: Shigar da sunan ku na ƙarshe
auth.lastNameRequired: Don Allah shigar da sunan ku na ƙarshe

roleSelection.title: Ta yaya za ku yi amfani da Fixit?
roleSelection.description: Zaɓi yadda za ku yi amfani da FIXIT. Kuna iya canza zaɓin ku koyaushe a cikin saitunan bayanan ku.

vehicle_owner.title: Mai Mota
vehicle_owner.description: Don sa ido da kula da motar mutum.

fleet_manager.title: Mai Sarrafa Motoci
fleet_manager.description: Don sarrafa da bin motoci da yawa.

mechanic.title: Makaniki
mechanic.description: Don karɓa da kula da buƙatun gyara.

forgotPasswordScreen.title: Kun Manta da Kalmar Sirri
forgotPasswordScreen.instruction: Shigar da imel ɗinku don sake saita kalmar sirrinku. Za mu aiko muku da OTP don ƙirƙirar sabuwar kalmar sirri.

stayConnectedScreen.title: Kasance a haɗe kuma a shirye
stayConnectedScreen.description: Bada izinin sanarwa don samun faɗakarwar aiki da sabunta matsayi, da kuma bada izinin samun damar wuri don aiyuka a wurin da kuma ganin wurin gyara.

createNewPasswordScreen.title: Ƙirƙiri sabuwar kalmar sirri
createNewPasswordScreen.instruction: Shigar da kalmar sirri mai ƙarfi don amintar da asusunka. Zaɓi kalmar sirri mai aminci da za ku tuna.
createNewPasswordScreen.resetFailed: Kasa sake saita kalmar sirri. Don Allah a sake gwadawa.
createNewPasswordScreen.successTitle: An Yi Nasarar Sake Saida Kalmar Sirri
createNewPasswordScreen.successDesc: Yanzu za ku iya shiga da sabuwar kalmar sirrinku.

uploadProfilePictureScreen.title: Ɗora hoton martaba
uploadProfilePictureScreen.instruction: Ƙara hotonku bayyananne don gina amana tare da masu motoci da manajojin motoci. Hoton martaba yana taimakawa abokan ciniki su gane ku kuma yana sa martabarku ta yi fice.
uploadProfilePictureScreen.instruction_mechanic: Ƙara hotonku bayyananne don gina amana tare da masu motoci da manajojin motoci. Hoton martaba yana taimakawa abokan ciniki su gane ku kuma yana sa martabarku ta yi fice.
uploadProfilePictureScreen.instruction_fleet_manager: Ɗora hotonku bayyananne ko tambarin kasuwanci don ba wa martabar motocin ku ganewa.
uploadProfilePictureScreen.instruction_vehicle_owner: Ɗora hotonku bayyananne. Wannan yana taimaka wa makanikai su tabbatar suna saduwa da mutumin da ya dace a lokacin buƙatar sabis.
uploadProfilePictureScreen.uploadSuccess: An ɗora hoton martaba cikin nasara

mechanicProfileSetup.title: Shirya bayanin makaniki
mechanicProfileSetup.instruction: Faɗa mana game da ƙwarewar ku don mu haɗa ku da ayyukan gyara da suka dace. Shirya bayanan ku yana sa ya zama da sauƙi a gare ku don samun buƙatun sabis da sauri.

verifyCodeScreen.verificationInstruction: Don amincinka, don Allah shigar da lambar 4 da muka aiko zuwa {{email}}
verifyCodeScreen.resetInstruction: Don Allah shigar da lambar 4 da muka aiko zuwa {{email}} don sake saita kalmar sirri
verifyCodeScreen.incompleteCodeError: Don Allah shigar da cikakkiyar lambar 4
verifyCodeScreen.invalidCodeError: Lambar tabbatarwa ba daidai ba ce. Don Allah a sake gwadawa.
verifyCodeScreen.resendTimerLabel: Kuna iya sake aika lambar a cikin
verifyCodeScreen.codeResentSuccess: An aiko sabuwar lambar tabbatarwa zuwa imel ɗinku
verifyCodeScreen.resendFailed: Kasa sake aika lambar. Don Allah a sake gwadawa.
verifyCodeScreen.modalSuccessTitle: An Yi Nasarar Tabbatar da Imel
verifyCodeScreen.modalSuccessDesc: An tabbatar da imel ɗinku cikin nasara. Yanzu za ku iya shiga kuma ku fara amfani da asusunku
